about.title: Hi, I am
about.subtitle: I am a
text: I am a motivated and versatile individual, always ready to tackle new challenges.

With experience and confident skills as a Full Stack developer, I am capable of efficiently working on diverse projects. I am continuously evolving and open to constructive criticism, which helps me improve.

My goal is not just to complete tasks, but to create high-quality projects in collaboration with a friendly and ambitious team. I strive for professionalism in my work and aim to achieve significant results in web development.

head.title: Skills

head.title: Experience
head.subtitle: My experience working as a web developer in various companies.

head.title: Projects
head.subtitle: During my time in the IT industry, I have created numerous projects, ranging from simple single-page websites and pet projects to large-scale e-commerce platforms, portals, and other websites.

head.title: Contacts
